name: OR_LNLG_LASERS
description: This table contains the laser information for the surgical log (ORL).

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LASER_DEVICE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the laser.

columns.name: LASER_TOTAL_WATTS
columns.description: Total watts used for this laser device in this log.

columns.name: LASER_TOTAL_PULSES
columns.description: The total pulses used for this laser device in this log.

columns.name: LASER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to a particular laser type.

columns.name: LASER_LO_SET
columns.description: The low setting for the laser.

columns.name: LASER_HI_SET
columns.description: The high setting for the laser.

columns.name: LASER_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The operation mode category number for this laser.

columns.name: LASER_PULSE_HI_FRE
columns.description: The high pulse frequency of the laser.

columns.name: LASER_PULSE_LO_FRE
columns.description: The low pulse frequency of the laser.

columns.name: LASER_FIBER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to a particular fiber type used in this laser.

columns.name: LASER_TOT_JOULES
columns.description: Stores the total joules used for the Laser.

columns.name: LASER_WAVELENGTH
columns.description: Stores the wavelength of the Laser.

columns.name: LASER_TOTAL_TIME
columns.description: Stores the total time that the laser was used.

columns.name: LASER_FIBER_SIZE
columns.description: The fiber size of the laser.

columns.name: LASER_PLUME_EXCV_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to a particular evacuation method for plumes of smoke generated from laser cauterization.

columns.name: LASER_OPERATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider that operated this laser for the procedure.

columns.name: LASER_POWER_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The power unit category number for the power measurements documented on this laser.

columns.name: LASER_INTERVAL
columns.description: The number of seconds for the interval of this laser.

columns.name: LASER_DURATION
columns.description: The number of seconds for the duration of this laser.

columns.name: LASER_DELIV_METH_C_NAME
columns.description: The delivery method category number for this laser.

columns.name: LASER_HANDPC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to the type of hand piece used for operating the laser.

columns.name: LASER_HANDPC_SIZE
columns.description: The size in millimeters of the hand piece used while operating the laser device.

columns.name: LASER_MICRO_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to the type of microscope used for operating the laser.

columns.name: LASER_MICRO_SIZE
columns.description: The size (in millimeters) of the microscope used while operating the laser device.

columns.name: LASER_HEADPC_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to the type of head piece used for operating the laser.

columns.name: LASER_HEADPC_SIZE
columns.description: The size (in millimeters) of the head piece used while operating the laser device.

columns.name: LASER_FIBER_LOT_NUM
columns.description: The lot number of the laser fiber.

columns.name: LASER_ENERGY_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The energy unit category number for the energy measurements documented on this laser.

columns.name: LSC_FIO2_LEVEL_OK_YN_NAME
columns.description: The FiO2 level category number for the laser safety checklist.

columns.name: LSC_FIRE_EXTINGSR_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether a fire extinguisher was available: 11 - Yes , 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_FIRE_REDUCTN_YN_NAME
columns.description: The fire risk reduction strategy category number for the laser safety checklist.

columns.name: LSC_FIRE_SAFE_DG_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether fire-retardant drapes and gowns were used: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_LSR_EVAC_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the smoke evacuator was positioned during laser use: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_ET_TUBE_USED_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether an endotracheal tube was used during laser use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_MOIST_ITEMS_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether moistened towels, gauze, and sponges were available for safety during laser use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_BASIN_WATER_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether a water-filled basin was available for safety during laser use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PAT_EYE_PROT_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the patient's eyes were protected while the laser was in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_STAFF_EYEWEAR_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the staff's eyes were protected while the laser was in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PHYS_EYEWEAR_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the physician's eyes were protected while the laser was in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_EYEWEAR_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether protective eyewear was available:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_NO_EYEWEAR_RSN
columns.description: The column displays the reason for the lack of protective eyewear documented by the circulating nurse.

columns.name: LSC_STAFF_MASK_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the staff used protective masks while the laser was in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_MASK_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether protective masks were available:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_RCTL_PACK_RMV_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether rectal packing was removed:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_SIGNS_HUNG_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether appropriate danger signs were hung on doors:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_EYEWEAR_HUNG_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether protective eyewear was hung on doors available for use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_WINDOWS_COVRD_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the windows were covered while laser was in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_STERILE_FLUID_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether sterile water and other sterile fluids were available:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_N2O_LEVEL_OK_YN_NAME
columns.description: The N2O level category number for the laser safety checklist.

columns.name: LSC_DOOR_LOCKED_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the door was locked for safety while the laser was in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_FIBER_CHECKED_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser fiber integrity was checked:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_FILTER_CABLE_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the microscope filter cable was positioned appropriately:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_MICROSCP_FLTR_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether there was a filter on the microscope:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_NON_REFLCTVTY_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the instruments were checked for non-reflectivity:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_LASER_TESTED_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser was test-fired prior to use: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_KEY_RETURNED_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser key was returned:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_LASER_STANDBY_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser was in standby mode when not in use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PEDAL_POSITND_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser pedal position was appropriate:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_MICROSCP_CHKD_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the microscope was inspected prior to use:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_SELF_CHECK_YN_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser self-check was performed: 1 - Yes, 2 - No.

columns.name: LSC_BEAM_PATTERN_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser beam pattern was checked:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_FIBER_CALIB_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser fiber was calibrated:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_FIBER_EXPIRE_DT
columns.description: The column displays the expiration date of the fiber.

columns.name: LSC_FIBER_LOT_NUM
columns.description: The column displays the lot number of the laser fiber.

columns.name: LSC_CIRCUIT_POS_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the circuit breaker was in the correct position:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_CORDS_PLUGGED_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the cords were plugged into appropriate outlets:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_DELIVERY_SYS_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the delivery system was properly connected:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_CORD_CONDTION_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the electrical cords were in good condition:  11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_LASER_REGION_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column points to a particular operative region to which the laser was applied.

columns.name: LSC_GAS_ON_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser gas was turned on appropriately: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_GAS_OFF_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the laser gas was turned off appropriately: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PE_EYE_PROT_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the patient was educated about laser eye protection: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PE_MOVEMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the patient was educated about not moving during the procedure: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PE_TALKING_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates, for facial procedures, whether the patient was educated about not talking during the procedure: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PE_NOISE_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the patient was educated about the noises that may occur during the procedure: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_PE_DRAPES_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether the patient was educated about the special drapings: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LSC_ASST_AVAIL_C_NAME
columns.description: The number populated in this column indicates whether a laser assistant was available while the laser was in use: 11 - Yes, 12 - No, 13 - Not Applicable (For older records, the column may return 0 for No, 1 for Yes, and 3 for Not Applicable).

columns.name: LASER_LATERALITY_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores laterality for a laser device.

columns.name: LSC_TIMEOUT_BEF_C_NAME
columns.description: Documenting this item verifies that a timeout was done by all members of the surgical team prior to laser activation.

columns.name: LSC_EMERG_REVD_C_NAME
columns.description: This item verifies that the laser emergency stop procedure was reviewed before use.

columns.name: LSC_PWR_SET_COMM_C_NAME
columns.description: Documenting this item verifies that the laser power settings were communicated to the surgeon prior to its use.

columns.name: LSC_TIPS_RETURN_C_NAME
columns.description: Document if laser tips were returned as part of laser checklist.

columns.name: LSC_CLN_AFTER_USE_C_NAME
columns.description: The value populated in this column indicates whether a laser was cleaned after use in a procedure.

columns.name: LSC_STR_AFTER_USE_C_NAME
columns.description: The value populated in this column indicates whether a laser was stored properly after use in a procedure.

columns.name: LASER_ENERGY_LOW
columns.description: The initial/low energy setting for the laser in chosen units.

columns.name: LASER_ENERGY_HIGH
columns.description: The final/high energy setting for the laser in chosen units.

columns.name: LASER_CPG_DENSITY
columns.description: The density of the CPG laser.

columns.name: LASER_CPG_PATTERN
columns.description: The pattern of the CPG laser.

columns.name: LASER_CPG_SIZE
columns.description: The size of the CPG laser.

columns.name: LASER_DISTANCE
columns.description: The distance between the laser fiber and the laser application point. This information is required for some vascular surgery research projects.

columns.name: LASER_LENGTH_TREATD
columns.description: The length of the area treated by the laser. This information is required for some vascular surgery research projects.

columns.name: LASER_PULSE_DUR_LOW
columns.description: Stores the low end of the pulse duration range for the laser.

columns.name: LASER_PULSE_DUR_HI
columns.description: Stores the high end of the pulse duration range for the laser.

columns.name: LASER_AVG_POWER
columns.description: This item is used to document laser average power.

columns.name: LASER_PULSE_FREQ_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The laser pulse frequency unit.

columns.name: LASER_ENERGY_PER_PULSE_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The laser energy per pulse unit.

columns.name: LASER_PULSE_DURATION_UNIT_C_NAME
columns.description: The laser pulse duration unit.
